1.2.name: wordpress/advanced-tag-search
1.2.description:
This plugin offers your visitors the possibility search on post tags. All you have to do is install this plugin and create a page and add the following shortcode: [tagsarchive]

The following CSS classes and divisions are added to this plugin so you are able to customize the look in your own stylesheet. This because when i update the plugin, no work will be lost on your side.

form#form-search-tags, span.error, form#form-search-tags legend, form#form-search-tags fieldset, span.headings, form#form-search-tags h3
